title: Interpretation of need in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of need in a dream: emergency. In the dream, a man mentioned multiple female relationships and his failure to do so. Whoever is married and sees in his dream an urgent need shows his betrayal of his wife. And the one who was engaged indicates cancellation of medicine. The vision indicates the dreamer’s inability to act properly in his relationships with others. It indicates the dreamer’s lack of confidence in himself. She dreams of many Of the types of need that occur in a dream, the vision indicates that the dreamer exaggerates his actions. The vision indicates the hardships and crises that the dreamer is going through in his work. It also indicates the loss of people due to the transmission of words between them. It is due to the immaturity of the viewer. He is mentally and emotionally unstable. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the fall of necessity is what Ibn Sirin said. A need in a dream indicates this hypocrisy, the fake life of a fortune teller. It goes back to I make mistakes, sins, and fun in this world and forgetting the afterlife. It indicates a difficult time that the dreamer is going through because he follows his desires. Interpretation of the vision of drinking carbonated water. The vision indicates that the dreamer will emerge from a difficult period of psychological pressure that has passed. It can indicate the repayment of a debt The success of the student and the release of the prisoner. The vision indicates a trip to spend recreational holidays. It announces the viewer’s democracy in family decision-making. It also means the psychological balance of the dreamer. The importance of the need that occurs with food. Anyone who dreams of drinking a spilled drink in a dream while eating is a sign of being a person who does so. Action Goodness and doing sins and making mistakes at the same time. It also indicates that many happy and bad events occur together for the Lord in a period. Interpretation of seeing the fall of the need of others. Whoever sees that he is pouring and filling the needs of others in a dream shows the entry of this person who has their problems. The vision also indicates that the dreamer is going through an event that he believes is Good, but in the end it will be bad. The meaning of a dream about fruit-flavored soft drinks: Whoever dreams that he drank a fruit-flavored drink in a dream, this is a sign of a serious ordeal, but he has found the perfect solution to solve it and get rid of it once and for all. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, with reference to the marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

If a married woman sees refusing adultery, this may lead to her closeness to God and God knows. If an unmarried girl sees refusing adultery in a dream, this may indicate distancing from sin and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees refusing adultery in a dream, it may be evidence of sustenance and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of death in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of death in a dream for a single woman: An unmarried girl expects that when she dreams of death in a dream, this is evidence of evil, but the opposite happens, good news for her. Anyone who is late for marriage dreams of death, this is a sign of her imminent marriage. Seeing the death of a loved one in a dream indicates his final separation and the person who sees The painful past is with him. As in the case of an unmarried young man, the dream of death calls for his marriage to a beautiful girl. The meaning of the smile of the angel of death in a dream. This vision is considered a dream with a good meaning. Whoever sees the angel of death in a dream smiling at her and standing before her is a sign of her long life and good health. When An unmarried woman dreams that the angel of death kisses her on the forehead, which means that there is a large inheritance on her way. The meaning of the death of her beloved in a dream: The girl who dreams of the death of her lover in a dream and hearing the news and its spread is a sign of his return and setting the date for the marriage contract. As for the one who dreamed that she died and saw Burying her and having people and her family cry over her and standing around her grave indicates her marriage and her great marriage. Interpretation of a dream about the death of parents in one dream When a girl dreams of the death of her brother in a dream, this is a great indication of great interest and benefit for her from her brother. As for seeing the death of a sister, it is a sign that the dreamer will hear news Happy through her sister. Seeing the death of relatives is a sign of bad news. In the case of a dream about the death of a father or mother, it means collapse and a feeling of extreme sadness as a result of the loss of the bond. As for a girl seeing the death of her friend, the relative announces his separation after many years of ten years of love and understanding between them. Add the dream you would like Its interpretation, with reference to the marital status, is in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of stealing a phone in a dream and dreaming of stealing a mobile phone

preview.html: Seeing a stolen phone in a dream symbolizes revealing what he is hiding and hiding in illegal ways, and the dream is evidence of losing hope in the work he is doing, and God knows best. Interpretation of stealing a phone in a dream: Stealing a phone in a dream indicates that it is hidden and hidden in illegal ways, and whoever sees that his old mobile phone has been stolen In a dream, this indicates disclosing his memories in front of others, and seeing a new phone stolen in a dream shows the dreamer’s negligence, mismanagement, and seeing theft. His talking mobile phone in a dream indicates huge losses. Seeing an attempt to steal someone’s phone in a dream indicates an attempt to spy on him. As for failing in an attempt to steal mobile phones in a dream, this indicates an inability to access and follow the news, and whoever sees him taking mobile phones from people On the street in a dream, it means illegal profit and theft. Mobile phones from relatives in a dream mean that you are looking forward to knowing their news. Whoever sees that he is accused of stealing a mobile phone in a dream, this means that he will be held accountable. As for the dream of accusing someone you know of stealing a cell phone, it indicates that there are problems with him, and the dream of accusing a friend of stealing a mobile phone indicates abuse. Interpretation of seeing someone stealing a mobile phone in a dream: Seeing someone stealing a mobile phone in a dream means that someone is stalking the viewer and spying on his news, and whoever sees someone he knows stealing his cell phone in a dream, this indicates his malicious intentions, and seeing a stranger stealing your cell phone in a dream. It means being exposed to rumors and slander and to see soon. A person stealing your cell phone in a dream indicates the interference of relatives in the private life of a fortune teller. Seeing someone stealing your cell phone from your bag in a dream means that your secrets are spreading among people, and if you see someone taking your cell phone from your pocket, it means being robbed and robbed. The dream Catching someone trying to steal a cell phone means that the dreamer will accept whoever wants evil with him, and anyone who sees someone stealing his cell phone and running away in the dream shows weakness and weakness. Seeing someone stealing your cell phone and denying that it was stolen in a dream means being deceived and deceived, and seeing yourself searching About someone about your cell phone in a dream indicates a lot of suspicion and suspicion from others. Interpretation of stealing a cell phone and crying in a dream Seeing a stolen cell phone and crying in a dream indicates that the dreamer regrets the things he did. Whoever sees his phone stolen and shouts loudly at it in a dream, this It means that he falls into anxiety and sadness, and seeing him crying and screaming when his mobile phone is stolen means that he is asking for help from others and asking for help when he is exposed to scandals, and dreaming of crying and crying over the theft of the mobile phone indicates an attempt to falsify Scorpio’s news about the fortuneteller. Seeing someone crying over his stolen mobile phone in a dream means That he is exposed to scandal, and whoever sees himself comforting someone who is crying over the theft of his mobile phone in a dream means that he stands by him in adversity. Whoever sees himself crying over the theft of his modern mobile phone in the dream

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of entering the house of the dead

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about entering the house of the deceased has many and varied interpretations that vary depending on the viewer’s relationship with the dead person, the house and the atmosphere in which he lives, as well as the viewer’s reaction and feelings upon entering the house, as it could portend evil or danger near the viewer. Entering the house of the dead in a dream often indicates obtaining something that belonged to the deceased in his life, as it may be his job, his position, his position among people, his money and possessions, Entering the house of one of his deceased relatives, but the house has many changes and developments, this is a sign that the dreamer has started a business for his family, but he will achieve abundant successes and profits in the future. As for someone who dreams of entering an old or wealthy house, this is a sign that he will join the ranks of the famous and righteous and it will be an occasion to spread goodness and great benefit among people, and he may achieve overwhelming success in one of the rare fields that benefit people. Interpretation of the dream of entering the house of the dead by Ibn Sirino, according to the great Sheikh Ibn Shirin Entering the house of a dead person is known to the fortuneteller, which indicates that he received abundant money or an inheritance from that person, and that person could be the cause of great benefit to him. It is dear to the pioneer, who was always praying to the Lord (Glory be to Him) for her, and it also promises good news of getting rid of severe distress and escaping from the danger that was threatening the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of dreams of entering the house of the dead for single, unmarried women who saw in a dream that she was visiting one of her deceased parents In her old house, and this is a reminder of the traditions in which she grew up, to observe and preserve the fragrant biography of her parents and her praiseworthy position among the people. As for the girl who visits an old, abandoned house covered in dust, this indicates that her heart is full of fears and obsessions about the future and the upcoming events that she can see. Gold in many fields to choose from, which suits her abilities and capabilities and achieves a decent living for her. As for her entering an old palace of a historical figure, this is an indication that she will soon marry a rich and famous person, which will bring her good luck with fame and happiness. Interpretation of a dream about entering a deceased person for a woman Married Woman: Visiting the old house of a person who died a long time ago indicates that she feels a state of psychological distress in her heart, due to the many problems and disagreements between her and her husband, and the situation worsens otherwise. The difficult crisis that you are going through will soon end and end forever, just like visiting the home of a dead woman you know, this indicates that the wife will soon become pregnant and give birth to a good offspring that she always wanted, while the wife who sees a deceased person with familiar features invites her to visit his home, and she must take care of her deceased relatives. And you give alms on their souls and pray for them, just as you enter the house of the deceased with decorations. This is good news of happy events and good things that fortune-telling or fortune-telling will witness.

And you give alms on their souls and pray for them, just as you enter the house of the deceased with decorations. This is good news of happy events and good things that fortune-telling or fortune-telling will witness.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a black shroud in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a black shroud in a dream: the color black in general worries many people. Dream. Interpretation of a dream about a black shroud in a dream. Seeing a black shroud in a dream for an unmarried girl means death, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a girl sees a white shroud in her dream, this indicates her marriage and wearing a wedding dress. Seeing a black shroud in a married woman’s dream indicates misfortunes and troubles. But if a person sees in his dream that he is buying a black shroud, then this is a good vision, as this vision indicates wealth and goodness. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream a white sheet of paper, this is a good sign. Interpretation of a dream about a living person’s shroud in a dream: Seeing a wrapped person in a dream is an unpleasant vision. It indicates the emergence of adversities and problems. If the sleeper sees the shroud in his dream that it is public, then this is a sign of money, prestige and power, and it is a welcome vision. While if the girl sees a bowl in her dream, this is an indication of the wedding ceremony, but it may not be completed, but the green shroud is A sign of success. Seeing someone wrapped in a white shroud in a dream is an indication that the dreamer has a tendency toward adultery and immorality. This is God, the Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of a dead child wrapped in a dream. If a girl sees a vessel in her dream, a small child in his shroud, this is evidence that she will get married soon, God willing, and that God will provide this girl with cover and purity. This vision indicates positive changes in the life of The dreamer will soon have an event, in addition to stability. While a married woman sees in her dream that there is a small child in the shroud, this is a vision worthy of praise because this vision indicates the end of marital disputes. Seeing the burial of a small child in a dream indicates that the dreamer’s situation has changed for the better, and this The vision indicates the end of problems. Interpretation of a dream about washing and shrouding in a dream: Seeing a dead person washing and shrouding him indicates his sincere repentance, and washing the dead cleanses him of sins. Seeing washing the dead in a dream indicates the dreamer’s long life and the life and blessings he will obtain, and this vision shows the dreamer’s repentance before his death. If The sleeper saw in his dream that the dead person was washed and shrouded, so there is no need for worry; Because it is a welcome vision that indicates goodness, life, and blessing. In all cases, for women and men alike, the vision of washing and shrouding the dead is considered a benign vision that portends goodness, and this vision shows the closeness of the servant to his master. Interpretation of a dream about hiding a dead person in a dreamIf the sleeper sees it in his dream The coffin of a dead person, this is a praiseworthy vision because it shows the status of the dead person in the afterlife. But if the sleeper sees in his dream a living person surrounded by him, then this is an unpleasant vision that portends evil. And whoever sees someone he knows surrounding him in a dream, this is a sign of farewell and separation from that person. In general, Seeing someone wrapped in a dream is an indication of that person’s sadness and the problems he faces, and this may indicate that he is wrong. This is God the Most High and He knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the dead and leaving the grave in a shroud. If a prisoner sees in his dream that a person has already died and left the grave, this is a sign that this person has achieved his freedom. While you see a dead person coming out of the shroud and in reality this person is on

While a married woman sees in her dream that there is a small child in the shroud, this is a vision worthy of praise because this vision indicates the end of marital disputes. Seeing the burial of a small child in a dream indicates that the dreamer’s situation has changed for the better, and this The vision indicates the end of problems. Interpretation of a dream about washing and shrouding in a dream: Seeing a dead person washing and shrouding him indicates his sincere repentance, and washing the dead cleanses him of sins. Seeing washing the dead in a dream indicates the dreamer’s long life and the life and blessings he will obtain, and this vision shows the dreamer’s repentance before his death. If The sleeper saw in his dream that the dead person was washed and shrouded, so there is no need for worry; Because it is a welcome vision that indicates goodness, life, and blessing. In all cases, for women and men alike, the vision of washing and shrouding the dead is considered a benign vision that portends goodness, and this vision shows the closeness of the servant to his master. Interpretation of a dream about hiding a dead person in a dreamIf the sleeper sees it in his dream The coffin of a dead person, this is a praiseworthy vision because it shows the status of the dead person in the afterlife. But if the sleeper sees in his dream a living person surrounded by him, then this is an unpleasant vision that portends evil. And whoever sees someone he knows surrounding him in a dream, this is a sign of farewell and separation from that person. In general, Seeing someone wrapped in a dream is an indication of that person’s sadness and the problems he faces, and this may indicate that he is wrong. This is God the Most High and He knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the dead and leaving the grave in a shroud. If a prisoner sees in his dream that a person has already died and left the grave, this is a sign that this person has achieved his freedom. While you see a dead person coming out of the shroud and in reality this person is on

title: Interpretation of seeing a beautiful girl in a dream for a married man by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a beautiful girl in a dream for a married man is one of the dreams that make dreamers curious for fear that something unpleasant will happen in the dreamer’s life. Today, through the Asrar Dream Interpretation website, and based on the desire of our followers, we will refer to the interpretation of the dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing a beautiful girl in a dream for a married man. Seeing a man A married man marrying a woman of great beauty is a sign that something good will happen in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation scholars have reported that the appearance of a beautiful girl in a married man’s dream indicates that there is something he has been hiding from his wife for a long time, knowing that if this matter is revealed, he will be exposed. To some danger. Conflicts with her kindness. If the girl who appears in a man’s dream is a foreigner, this indicates that a broad diet will arrive in the dreamer’s life and that he will soon be able to achieve all his goals. The appearance of a beautiful girl to a married man indicates that he will receive a lot of good news that can change The dreamer's life is for the better. If the dreamer is in a dispute with someone in reality, the dream symbolizes reaching an appropriate solution to end this dispute, and the appearance of a beautiful girl to a married man who has children of marriageable age indicates that one of them will get... He got married in the near future. Interpretation of seeing a beautiful girl in a dream with a married man from Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin explained that the appearance of a beautiful woman with complete elegance in a married man’s dream indicates that good luck and wealth will be his allies in life, so if he is feeling disappointed at the moment Because he achieved none of that. goals, we tell him to get rid of this feeling and everything will get better. The appearance of a beautiful girl in a dream for a married man reflects that at the moment he is thinking about marrying again, as he does not find comfort or happiness with his wife, and whoever takes the step to apply for a new job, the dream portends By accepting this.Interpretation of seeing a beautiful girl in a dream for a married man by Ibn Shaheen. The appearance of a beautiful girl in a married man’s dream is a sign of attaining the highest positions and obtaining promotions in difficult times. The interpretation of a dream about a man who is burdened with debt is approaching an important breakthrough in his life by paying off all these debts and living well. Whoever dreams of a beautiful girl and his wife is pregnant at the same time proves that he will have a very beautiful girl who will be loyal to her father and mother, and the appearance of a beautiful girl in general in a man’s dream It is a sign that the coming days will bring him a lot of good news and he will be able to touch his dreams that he has always desired. A beautiful girl in a man’s dream is good news that he has very good morals and that in general he is a very popular person in his social environment. Interpretation of seeing a beautiful girl in a dream With a man married to the real Imam. Seeing a beautiful virgin girl in a married man’s dream indicates the blessings in his life and several other interpretations mentioned by Imam Al-Sadiq, such as: Evidence of satisfying the situation and obtaining a large sum of money. If the dreamer has a girl who is going to get married, this is a sign that he All her affairs will be facilitated in marriage. Seeing a beautiful girl in...

title: Ibn Sirin’s most important interpretations of seeing a camel in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a camel in dreams. Many people see beauty or beauty in their dreams, and some are curious to know the interpretation of it because it has many meanings and associations. Some visions bode well and in others portend bad things. In this article we will explain the detailed picture from all directions. Seeing a camel in a dream If the dreamer sees a camel in a dream while in reality he is still studying, he can get the highest grades in tests and raise his academic standing. Seeing a poorly made black camel in a dream may mean that the dreamer has not It achieves what she was trying to achieve. If he sees a black camel in a dream and the dreamer gets married in reality, this does not bode well for him, because he will enter into a heated argument with his wife and may end up divorcing her. Seeing a camel in a person’s dream indicates his constant travel from one place to another. Another is to find a job with a high salary to change his living conditions and raise his status. In the event that a person suffers from a lack of money and sees a camel in his dream, this is a sign that positive changes will occur for him, and his life circumstances may completely change for the better. Skin of a camel in a dream is one of the good dreams for the dreamer, Because it means that he will have a large inheritance, through which he will be able to open many projects to expand his livelihood and become one of the influential people in society. As for whoever sees himself eating raw camel meat in a dream, this is a sign that the person has committed a crime, many sins, and that he is oppressing people, stealing their rights, and acquiring money in various ways. Illegal, so he should quickly stop it, and approach the Creator, Glory be to Him, and repent. Seeing a camel in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a camel in a dream as an indication of a woman’s good condition, her closeness to God Almighty, and her love for goodness. Seeing a camel A man in a dream means that he will soon marry a beautiful girl who has attractive features and noble moral qualities. Seeing a camel in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a girl with a camel in a dream symbolizes that she will meet a rich man who will marry her and live a happy married life with him. If an unmarried woman sees that a camel is walking In the opposite direction in a dream, it means that she may be exposed to many challenges and envy from some people with whom she broke off her relationship. A camel in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her ability to achieve everything she aspires to in the coming period, so do not get bored and continue trying. Seeing a camel in A dream for a married woman: Seeing a married camel in a dream indicates a good choice for her partner, because she will live a happy married life with him, and it also shows her sense of security. If a woman sees a beautiful camel in a dream, this means that she is always satisfied with the decree of God Almighty. When a married woman rides a camel in a dream This indicates her ability to bear the responsibilities imposed on her. Seeing a camel in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant camel in a dream indicates that she is in a bad mood due to excessive stress from childbirth and her fear of the fetus, so she needs calm to get through all of this safely.

title: Interpretation of seeing a hole in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a hole in a dream via the website Vision roy2a.com. A hole is a void in the ground and its presence poses a danger to people because falling into it could cause danger to their lives or loss of their lives, and today through we will present to you this article, the interpretation of seeing a hole in a dream according to great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, depending on the condition of the dreamer, follow us. Interpretation of seeing a hole in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of digging a hole for someone in a dream. It indicates that something bad will happen to the pioneer at this time, and God knows best. Dreaming of digging a well for drinking showed the dreamer a lot of goodness. And food in his life. Digging a canal in a dream shows that the dreamer will face some bad things in his life. Seeing a hole in the wall in a dream shows that the dreamer will make large profits in a short period of time. See also: Interpretation of seeing yourself walking in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a hole in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman. A married woman falls into a hole in a dream. This indicates that he will get married soon, and God knows best. Falling into a hole and injuring myself in a dream indicates that she will face many failures in her personal and professional life. Seeing isolated people falling into a hole to hide in a dream indicates that she is trying to overcome a problem in her life, But she will not be able to do that. See also: Interpretation of seeing the ground in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a hole in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a hole in a dream indicates that God will carry her soon, and God knows best. The hole in a married woman’s dream also indicates that there are many disagreements and problems between her and her. Her husband during this period. Seeing a married woman falling into many holes and struggling to get out in a dream confirms that she will be exposed to many obstacles and crises in her life and in her efforts to solve them. Interpretation of seeing a hole in a dream for a pregnant woman: Dreaming of falling into a hole without getting hurt announces that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Falling into a hole and getting injured in a dream about a pregnant woman indicates that she will face some health problems during the birth process, and God knows best. I see myself falling into a hole and climbing out of it in a dream. I see myself falling into a hole and climbing out of it in a dream. It indicates that the dreamer is planning something bad, but he will get out of it in the moment. The last, and God knows best. Falling into a hole in a married man’s dream shows that he will face a big problem in the near future, and someone close to him will help him get out of it. See also: Interpretation of seeing a valley in a dream. Interpretation of seeing filling a hole in a dream. Ibn Sirin’s explanation of seeing filling a hole with a group of people in a dream is It indicates that the dreamer will persecute many people in his life. Seeing the dreamer digging a group of holes in a dream shows that the dreamer has gotten rid of all the problems and crises that he faced in the past period. Filling a hole in a dream indicates that the viewer will be exposed to many crises and problems in the coming period. See Also: Interpretation of seeing yourself falling in a dream We are happy to see the location of your dream host about “seeing the hole” through the comments and the dream team will interpret

title: Interpretation of carpet in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a carpet in a dream. Learn about the interpretation of a carpet in a dream from Ibn Sirin. Dreams are defined as a series of visual scenes that reach a person’s subconscious when he enters a stage of deep sleep, during which he does not feel anything going on around him in reality, so he finds in front of him only his own image, The dreams that he experiences as if they are a logical and interconnected reality, and the events, although these events are completely unreal in reality, are known. Dreams carry within them many symbols and signs that indicate real events in a person’s life, which may bring him goodness or warn him of the calamity that may befall him. Interpretation of a carpet in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin indicated in his book The Interpretation of Great Dreams that seeing a carpet in a dream indicates However, a woman is chaste and pure in religion and good morals. She constantly performs her religious duties during their season, which adorns a man’s life and fills it with blessing. And pleasure. Her wedding. Whoever dreams that he is walking on a beautiful carpet, this indicates the blessing of his life and the abundance of livelihood that he enjoys, and this vision indicates prosperity of circumstances and tranquility in the life of its owner. Whoever is single and sees a beautiful carpet in his dream will have this vision of marrying a beautiful girl with a beautiful appearance soon if God willing. Also, the vision of buying a carpet in a dream indicates that the dreamer will receive halal money as a result of concluding a profitable project or business soon. The vision of sitting on the carpet indicates traveling outside the country, and this may be with the intention of performing Hajj or Umrah rituals, and sitting on the carpet. With a group of people, it expresses the friendship of the visionary with many great scholars. A position in society. Whoever sees in his dream that he is placing a carpet in a place, this indicates that he will reach a high position in the place where he placed the carpet, in addition to that he will obtain a lot of goodness from that place. While seeing the loss of a carpet in a dream is considered an unpleasant matter, as it indicates that the dreamer is committing disobedience and disobedience and refraining from acts of obedience. Seeing carpets being sold in a dream means that the dreamer will be exposed to many obstacles and problems in financial matters, and God is Most High and knows the unseen. A carpet in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a carpet in a married woman’s dream is one of the good things that indicates that woman’s good faith and morals, her insistence on faith, obedience to God Almighty, honoring her parents, and obeying her husband. A married woman who dreams of buying a green carpet indicates that she will get a lot Of good things or that she will soon give birth to a beautiful girl. Seeing a husband giving his wife a beautiful rug in a dream means that this woman will become pregnant, God willing, or that this vision will give her good skin the fulfillment of a wish she wanted from God Almighty a long time ago in Cairo. General. Ibn Sirin also showed that brushing a carpet in a dream generally indicates that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money and what is permissible, and his desires and goals will be fulfilled, God willing. Interpretations of dreams about a red carpet, Ibn Sirin explained that seeing
